channel.title: CVE Feed for Atlassian -- Bamboo
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Atlassian -- Bamboo

item.title: CVE-2017-18042|2024-09-17T00:32:15.539Z -- atlassian -- bamboo
item.description: The update user administration resource in Atlassian Bamboo before version 6.3.1 allows remote attackers to modify user data including passwords via a Cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability.
